ns0:Concept.displayName: Hospital discharge day management; 30 minutes or less
Hospital discharge day management; more than 30 minutes

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent inpatient hospital discharge services.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Encounter, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with identifying hospital discharge day management. This is a grouping of CPT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
